Callie, Saraban:
Go to the capital of Elmore Rune. Great Master Sigmund local Warriors Guild will surely be able to help You.
And if You find Kaina, show him this. This Is The Sign Of The Queen Serenia. Queen gave Cain the same sign, oath assuring that Artie will come to his aid, no matter where he was. Talk to him and try to figure out how the Device works for Predictions.
